devdoc.details: Only Swap contracts should initialize and own LPToken contracts.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the owner.

params.spender: The address of the spender to be approved.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the approval was successful or not.

params.from: address of account to burn tokens from

initialize(string,string).details: The caller of this function will become the owner. A Swap contract should call this in its initializer function.

mint(address,uint256).details: only owner can call this mint function

params.recipient: address of account to receive the tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the owner, using a permit signature.

params.deadline: The deadline by which the permit must be used.
params.owner: The address of the owner of the tokens.
params.r: The R component of the permit signature.
params.s: The S component of the permit signature.
params.spender: The address of the spender to be approved.
params.v: The recovery byte of the permit signature.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from the caller's address to another address.

params.to: The address to which the tokens will be transferred.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the transfer was successful or not.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from one address to another, on behalf of the owner.

params.from: The address from which the tokens will be transferred.
params.to: The address to which the tokens will be transferred.
params.value: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the transfer was successful or not.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Liquidity Provider Token

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Burns the given amount of LPToken from the specified account

initialize(string,string).notice: Initializes this LPToken contract with the given name and symbol

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints the given amount of LPToken to the recipient.

userdoc.notice: This token is an ERC20 detailed token with added capability to be minted by the owner. It is used to represent user's shares when providing liquidity to swap contracts.
